0: "You said you would vote against the Patriot Act, then you came to the Senate, you voted for it."
1: By 2009, "dozens of senior terrorists had been taken off the battlefield" by drones.
2: The Benghazi probe is "the longest-running congressional investigation ever."
3: "There have been seven investigations (of Benghazi) led mostly by Republicans in the Congress" that concluded "nobody did anything wrong, but there were changes we could make."
4: ISIS is "going to people showing videos of Donald Trump insulting Islam and Muslims in order to recruit more radical jihadists."
